original: @62b * // gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs bzhugs /🔽# // gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gos sngon can la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @62b * // gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs bzhugs / # // gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gos sngon can la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: The Sādhana of the Lord of Secrets, Vajrapāṇi, the Blue-Clad🔽Homage to the Lord of Secrets, Vajrapāṇi, the Blue-Clad.

original: phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
translated: The yogī who wishes to practice Vajrapāṇi, the Blue-Clad,

original: dang por khrus byas stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
analyzed: dang por khrus byas stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
translated: first takes a bath and sits on a comfortable seat.

original: yan lag bdun dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: yan lag bdun dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o //
translated: He should generate the mind endowed with the seven branches.

original: rang gi snying gar nyi ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i sa bon gyis gos sngon po can dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa spyan drangs te /
analyzed: rang gi snying gar nyi ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i sa bon gyis gos sngon po can dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa spyan drangs te /
translated: In his heart, on a sun and moon seat, he visualizes the seed syllable of the Blue-Clad, and invites the Buddhas, Bodhisattvas, and so forth.

original: sa bon las @63a * //
analyzed: sa bon las @63a * //
translated: From the seed syllable,

original: byung ba'i mchod pas mchod do //
analyzed: byung ba'i mchod pas mchod do //
translated: he makes offerings with the offerings that arise.

original: de nas 'di skad du /
analyzed: de nas 'di skad du /
translated: Then, he recites this:

original: dpal phyag na rdo rje dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa phyogs bcu na bzhugs so 'tshal la //
analyzed: dpal phyag na rdo rje dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa phyogs bcu na bzhugs so 'tshal la //
translated: The glorious Vajrapāṇi, the Buddhas, Bodhisattvas, and so forth, who dwell in the ten directions,

original: bdag lus ngag yid kyis sgo nas phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo //🔽mchod pa bla na med pa 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi char dag pa'i sems kyis sprul med pa'i dus nas dug gsum gyi dbang gis sdig pa ci bgyis pa med pa'i dus nas dug gsum gyi dbang gis sdig pa ci bgyis pa rnams so sor bshags shing slan
analyzed: bdag lus ngag yid kyis sgo nas phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo // mchod pa bla na med pa 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi char dag pa'i sems kyis sprul med pa'i dus nas dug gsum gyi dbang gis sdig pa ci bgyis pa med pa'i dus nas dug gsum gyi dbang gis sdig pa ci bgyis pa rnams so sor bshags shing slan
translated: I pay homage with my body, speech, and mind, and go for refuge.🔽With a pure mind, I emanate offerings of the five sense pleasures.

original: chad kyang sdom par bgyid do //
analyzed: chad kyang sdom par bgyid do //
translated: Whatever non-virtuous actions I have done under the influence of the three poisons, I confess each and every one, and will refrain from them in the future.

original: bde bar gshegs pa gang dag bskul ba'i sal bzhugs pa rnams la //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa gang dag bskul ba'i sal bzhugs pa rnams la //
translated: To the Sugatas who are exhorting,

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul bar bgyi'o //
translated: I exhort to turn the wheel of Dharma.

original: de bar gshegs ba gang dag mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa rnams la 'khor ba ji srid par mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba 'debs so //
analyzed: de bar gshegs ba gang dag mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa rnams la 'khor ba ji srid par mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba 'debs so //
translated: To the Sugatas who wish to pass into Nirvana, I request to not pass into Nirvana, but remain as long as samsara exists.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de ngag thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de ngag thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar bgyi'o //
translated: I dedicate all these roots of virtue to unsurpassed enlightenment.

original: ji ltar dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs byang chub tu sems bskyed cing dngos po thams cad dang bral ba /
analyzed: ji ltar dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs byang chub tu sems bskyed cing dngos po thams cad dang bral ba /
translated: Just as the minds of the Buddhas of the three times have generated the thought of awakening and are free from all things,

original: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du thugs bskyed pa bzhin //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du thugs bskyed pa bzhin //
translated: and have generated the thought in the nature of emptiness,

original: bdag gis kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
translated: so too I will generate the thought.

original: gzhan yang bdag gis 'phags pa rnams la lus phul te /
analyzed: gzhan yang bdag gis 'phags pa rnams la lus phul te /
translated: Moreover, I will offer my body to the noble ones,

original: sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'da' bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'da' bar bgyi'o //
translated: and I will lead all sentient beings to nirvana.

original: de nas rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid du bsam bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid du bsam bar bya'o //
translated: Then, one should contemplate all moving and unmoving things as emptiness.

original: de'i ngang las yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du zla ba dang nyi ma'o //
analyzed: de'i ngang las yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du zla ba dang nyi ma'o //
translated: From within that, upon a wind mandala arisen from yaṃ, there is a moon and sun.

original: de'i steng du h'um sngon po las byung ba'i rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i gos sngon can gyi gzugs su gyur par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du h'um sngon po las byung ba'i rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i gos sngon can gyi gzugs su gyur par bya'o //
translated: Upon that, from a blue hūṃ arises a vajra, which completely transforms into the form of Blue Acala.

original: de nas yungs kar phyogs su gtor bar bya zhing /
analyzed: de nas yungs kar phyogs su gtor bar bya zhing /
translated: Then, one should scatter mustard seeds in the directions and recite:

original: aom a'a:bighn'anta krita h'um phat //
analyzed: aom a'a:bighn'anta krita h'um phat //
translated: oṃ āḥ vigantakṛta hūṃ phaṭ.

original: ces brjod cing bskrad par bya'o //
analyzed: ces brjod cing bskrad par bya'o //
translated: Saying this, one should drive them away.

original: lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas te /
analyzed: lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas te /
translated: Having made the hook gesture,

original: sa bon las 'od zer spros te spyan drang bar bya'o ;
analyzed: sa bon las 'od zer spros te spyan drang bar bya'o ;
translated: one should invite them by emanating light rays from the seed syllable.

original: / gzungs kyi mjug la /
analyzed: / gzungs kyi mjug la /
translated: At the end of the dhāraṇī,🔽one should recite:

original: aom na ma:sa ma ya mandala ma de /
analyzed: aom na ma:sa ma ya mandala ma de /
translated: Oṃ, homage to the mandala of the Three Jewels!🔽Come, come!

original: a'a gatstsha ya a'a gatstsha ya /🔽pra be sha ya pra be sha ya /
analyzed: a'a gatstsha ya a'a gatstsha ya / pra be sha ya pra be sha ya /
translated: Open, open!

original: a'a ba lo k'a ya a'a ba lo k'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: a'a ba lo k'a ya a'a ba lo k'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Look, look! Hūṃ svāhā!

original: sa bya ba btags te spyan drang bar bya'o //
analyzed: sa bya ba btags te spyan drang bar bya'o //
translated: Having recited this, one should invite them.

original: de nas de la mchod pa dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de la mchod pa dbul bar bya'o //
translated: Then, one should make offerings to them.

original: hr'i ti ha zhes pas aargha yi'o //
analyzed: hr'i ti ha zhes pas aargha yi'o //
translated: With Hrīṃ ha, offer argha.

original: aom @63b badzra pushpe p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom @63b badzra pushpe p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
translated: With Oṃ vajra puṣpe pūja megha samudra spharaṇa samaye svāhā,

original: zhes pas me tog dbul dbul lo //
analyzed: zhes pas me tog dbul dbul lo //
translated: offer flowers.

original: aom badzra dh'u pa p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra dh'u pa p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
translated: With Oṃ vajra dhūpe pūja megha samudra spharaṇa samaye svāhā,

original: zhes pas bdug pa mdun du'o //
analyzed: zhes pas bdug pa mdun du'o //
translated: offer incense in front.

original: aom badzra d'i pam p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra d'i pam p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
translated: With Oṃ vajra dīpa pūja megha samudra spharaṇa samaye svāhā,

original: zhes pas mar me spyan la'o /
analyzed: zhes pas mar me spyan la'o /
translated: With this, offer the lamp to the eyes.

original: aom badzra ghandhe p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra ghandhe p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vajra gandhe pūja megha samudra spharaṇa samaye svāhā

original: zhes pas dri thugs kar ro //
analyzed: zhes pas dri thugs kar ro //
translated: With this, offer the perfume to the heart.

original: aom badzra nee bi dye p'u dza megha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra nee bi dye p'u dza megha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vajra naividya pūja megha samudra spharaṇa samaye svāhā

original: zhes pas zhal zas zhal du'o //
analyzed: zhes pas zhal zas zhal du'o //
translated: With this, offer the food to the mouth.

original: aom badzra g'i ti ghanta ghanta sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra g'i ti ghanta ghanta sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vajra gīti ghānta ghānta svāhā

original: zhes pas si la snyan snyan la'o //
analyzed: zhes pas si la snyan snyan la'o //
translated: With this, offer the music to the ears.

original: de nas bstod do //
analyzed: de nas bstod do //
translated: Then praise.

original: aom badzra sa ma ya stvam /
analyzed: aom badzra sa ma ya stvam /
translated: Oṃ vajra samaya stvaṃ

original: zhes pas gnyis su med par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pas gnyis su med par bya'o //
translated: With this, make it nondual.

original: de nas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: Then confer empowerment.

original: de nas rang gi snying gar ram las byung ba'i nyi ma'i steng du /
analyzed: de nas rang gi snying gar ram las byung ba'i nyi ma'i steng du /
translated: Then in one’s heart, from raṃ arises a sun,

original: rang gi sa bon las bzlas par bya ba'i yi ges bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi sa bon las bzlas par bya ba'i yi ges bskor bar bya'o //
translated: upon which is one’s seed syllable, surrounded by the mantra to be recited.

original: blos dmigs par bya ste /
analyzed: blos dmigs par bya ste /
translated: One should visualize it with the mind

original: sngags bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: sngags bzlas par bya'o //
translated: and recite the mantra.

original: sngags ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: sngags ni 'di yin te /
translated: The mantra is as follows:🔽Tadyathā

original: tadya th'a / bho bho ban n'a g'a dhi pa ta ye /
analyzed: tadya th'a / bho bho ban n'a g'a dhi pa ta ye /
translated: bho bho banāgadhipate

original: ai dan n'i l'am ba ra dha ra sha r'i ram /
analyzed: ai dan n'i l'am ba ra dha ra sha r'i ram /
translated: Idanani la, vara dhara shariram.

original: badzra p'a ni hri da yam /
analyzed: badzra p'a ni hri da yam /
translated: Vajrapani hridaya.

original: ya: sa m'a ti kra m'a ti //
analyzed: ya: sa m'a ti kra m'a ti //
translated: Yam sama ti krama ti.

original: aut+s'a da nam /
analyzed: aut+s'a da nam /
translated: Utsadani.

original: bha bi shuddhe /
analyzed: bha bi shuddhe /
translated: Bhavi shudde.🔽Tadyatha.

original: tadya th'a / buddhya buddhya /
analyzed: tadya th'a / buddhya buddhya /
translated: Budhya budhya.

original: bi buddha / ma ti pr'a pta /
analyzed: bi buddha / ma ti pr'a pta /
translated: Vibudhya mati prapta.

original: ha ra ha ra /
analyzed: ha ra ha ra /
translated: Hara hara.

original: n'a g'a n'am /
analyzed: n'a g'a n'am /
translated: Naganan.

original: pra ha ra pra ha ra /
analyzed: pra ha ra pra ha ra /
translated: Prahara prahara.

original: n'a g'a n'am /
analyzed: n'a g'a n'am /
translated: Naganan.🔽Chinda chinda.

original: tstshinda tstshinda / n'a ga hri da ya ni /
analyzed: tstshinda tstshinda / n'a ga hri da ya ni /
translated: Nagahridayani.🔽Bhinda bhinda.

original: bhinda bhinda / n'a ga da m'a ni ;
analyzed: bhinda bhinda / n'a ga da m'a ni ;
translated: Nagadamani.

original: bi si m'a da n'a ga sha r'i ra ni /
analyzed: bi si m'a da n'a ga sha r'i ra ni /
translated: Visphutayanagashariranini.

original: bi spho ta ya /
analyzed: bi spho ta ya /
translated: Visphotaya.

original: n'ag na ya n'a ni //
analyzed: n'ag na ya n'a ni //
translated: Nagayananini.

original: tadya th'a / n'a ga bi d'a ra n'a ya h'um phat /🔽n'a go tsha da n'a ya h'um phat /
analyzed: tadya th'a / n'a ga bi d'a ra n'a ya h'um phat / n'a go tsha da n'a ya h'um phat /
translated: Tadyatha.🔽Nagavidaranaya hum phat.

original: n'i l'am ba sa sta n'a ya h'um phat /
analyzed: n'i l'am ba sa sta n'a ya h'um phat /
translated: Nagotsadanaya hum phat.🔽Nilambhasatanaya hum phat.

original: aa pra ti ha ta pa la pa r'a kra m'a ya h'um phat /
analyzed: aa pra ti ha ta pa la pa r'a kra m'a ya h'um phat /
translated: Apratitahpala parakramane hum phat.

original: ro sha n'a ya phat /
analyzed: ro sha n'a ya phat /
translated: Roshanaya phat.

original: kushma ndo t+s'a ya phat /
analyzed: kushma ndo t+s'a ya phat /
translated: Kushmandotsayanaya phat.

original: pre ta pi sh'a tsa bi n'a sha ka r'a ya phat /
analyzed: pre ta pi sh'a tsa bi n'a sha ka r'a ya phat /
translated: Pretashipachakaranaya phat.

original: yaksha aa pa sm'a ra bi n'a sha ka r'a ya phat /
analyzed: yaksha aa pa sm'a ra bi n'a sha ka r'a ya phat /
translated: Yaksha apasmara vinashkara kara phata.

original: ha sa ha sa /
analyzed: ha sa ha sa /
translated: Hasa hasa.

original: dha ra dha ra /🔽m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
analyzed: dha ra dha ra / m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
translated: Dhara dhara.🔽Mara ya mara ya.

original: bha ksha ya bha ksha ya /
analyzed: bha ksha ya bha ksha ya /
translated: Bhakhaya bhakhaya.

original: sarba baghna bi n'a sha ka r'a ya phat /
analyzed: sarba baghna bi n'a sha ka r'a ya phat /
translated: Sarva bhagan vinashkara kara phata.

original: sarbba sha tr'um sam gha bi n'a sha ka r'a ya phat /
analyzed: sarbba sha tr'um sam gha bi n'a sha ka r'a ya phat /
translated: Sarva shatrum sangha vinashkara kara phata.

original: n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni dzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
analyzed: n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni dzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
translated: Nilam vara dhara vajra pani jnana payati svaha.

original: zhes bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bzlas par bya'o //
translated: One should recite this.

original: gal te gtong bar 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te gtong bar 'dod na /
translated: If one wishes to dismiss,

original: bzod par gsol ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo zhing /
analyzed: bzod par gsol ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo zhing /
translated: one should request forbearance, dedicate the roots of virtue,

original: smon lam gdab bo //
analyzed: smon lam gdab bo //
translated: and make aspirations.

original: de nas aom a'a: h'um mu: zhes pas ye shes kyi lha gshegs su gsol /
analyzed: de nas aom a'a: h'um mu: zhes pas ye shes kyi lha gshegs su gsol /
translated: Then, with Om Ah Hum Mu, one should request the departure of the awareness deities.

original: de nas thams cad mi dmigs par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas thams cad mi dmigs par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should meditate on the non-apprehension of everything.

original: yi ge brgya ba'i gsang sngags brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: yi ge brgya ba'i gsang sngags brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should recite the mantra of the one hundred syllables.

original: bla ma la gus pa @64a * //
analyzed: bla ma la gus pa @64a * //
translated: One should have respect for the guru,

original: pa dang ; shes rab dang snying rje dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: pa dang ; shes rab dang snying rje dang ldan zhing /
translated: and possess wisdom and compassion.

original: khyad par du gang la dad pa cher yod pa de la mur du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyad par du gang la dad pa cher yod pa de la mur du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: In particular, whoever has great faith in whom will be accomplished to the utmost.

original: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The sadhana of the secret lord Vajrapani

original: slob dpon chen po nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: slob dpon chen po nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: is complete, composed by the great master Krishnacharya.
